title: LAIR ORB / wearing revolutionary hat
description: Putting the hat on gives a one time +1 to Mazovian Socio-Economics, you communist failure.

dialogueTree.title: Rhetoric: "This hat is so soft, so warm. It wr..."
dialogueTree.text: This hat is so soft, so warm. It wraps around your head... and your mind tingles with all manner of socio-economic theory.

links.title: You: "This is an *ushanka*, right? (Pat t..."
links.text: This is an *ushanka*, right? (Pat the hat.)

links.title: Rhetoric: "Kras Mazov would have worn this ush..."
links.text: Kras Mazov would have worn this ushanka. Mazov knew where to cook those thoughts, that's why it bears a Mazovian logo.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Glory to the Revolution, comrade! W..."
links.text: Glory to the Revolution, comrade! Whether you like it or not, wearing this hat has made you more communist.

links.title: You: "Oops, it's a fashion faux pas! [Dis..."
links.text: Oops, it's a fashion faux pas! [Discard the thought -- and the hat.]

links.title: Rhetoric: "Let's hope no one saw you wearing t..."
links.text: Let's hope no one saw you wearing that outrageously communist hat.
